title: People I Admire
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Eli-san, thank you very much!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You don’t have to thank me. But, I was surprised that you suddenly asked me to teach you how to dance<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>For me, it’s really important to bring out the best in yourself when performing, so from now on, I want to increase my repertoire so I can draw from them for the things that I love<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Repertoire?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes. Because of that, I want to try practicing a dance where even the slightest move of a fingertip expresses a lot of things, like Eli-san who has experience in Ballet<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Is that so…. How do I say this, there’s no middle ground for you huh, Setsuna<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Aren’t you also the same, Eli-san? No, I think everyone in μ’s and Aqours shares the same feeling in that regard<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, that’s really nice of you. As thanks, maybe I’ll treat you some smoothies after this<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Eeh!? No, I’m the one that should be thanking you. You’re teaching me how to dance, after all<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>It’s fine, it’s fine. I’ve been there with Honoka and the others, it’s a place I recommend♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
